message: I'm a student who'll be off to university in a few months, thinking of going into finance, would love to speak with a VC to ask them about their job etc...
Any specific thing you want to know jeff?
Wow never actually thought anyone would respond!

Anyone have any thoughts on AngelList? Just joined up there and it appears to an excellent venue for startups and angels to connect. Anyone know of similar venues? Our profile is here: http://angel.co/sunday-drive

This is pretty much the canonical thread on Angellist: http://www.quora.com/AngelList/What-do-people-think-of-AngelList    there is also angelsoft.net which has been around for a long time, but they do not compare (imho)
